Name: BattleReign
About the game: Zanados people used the ancient Nerixus for several activities until it was decimated by the Pidel monsters. These monsters took over Nexirus and would kill anyone coming close to the civilization. The main goal is to find the Treasures of Wilous, God of Time and other treasures. Whoever gets the treasures will control time . These rings are scattered around different parts of Nerixus. Henna Wendel, is looking for the ring to set her people free. These include healing and leading them into a new world. Henna will have to fight the monsters and also search for rings in the entire Empire. Henna is a Cyberpunk Specie Trying to save her people. In order to make that happen she will have to take on the monsters to liberate her people. An action pack adventure game. Players will experience thirdperson ultimate shooter. Turn in Place animation, different firepower weapons. stealth mode. pickups and on the level while trying to defeat the Pidel monsters and complete the quest.
